top_categories.workout_context: 58ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
When someone attacks on Colorado plains gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Mad Gravel's Colorado plains, Rolling gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 55 miles.
At Mad Gravel, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Mad Gravel. Train it until it feels boring.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Mad Gravel's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before September.
Base fitness for Mad Gravel. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Varied gradients on Colorado plains gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Mad Gravel, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
55 miles on Colorado plains gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Low-cadence force work for 3,200ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Mad Gravel’s 55 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Mad Gravel. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Mad Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colorado plains gravel to build confidence. Expect: colorado plains, rolling gravel, high altitude.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, VO2max, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 55 miles of colorado plains gravel in Elbert, CO.
